title: High Performance line graph control based on Dynamic Data Display
body: Support for a high performance line graph control based on (or similar to) the Microsoft Research Project Dynamic Data Display (http://dynamicdatadisplay.codeplex.com/). Dynamic Data DIsplay is great but work on this project appears to have stopped.

comments.body:
dear. microsoft,
please resume support for D3 with emphasis on documentation and tutoris. The performance of the library appears to be outststandig anyhow.
Why did this die? It is a great graphing tool! Bring it back!
OxyPlot (http://oxyplot.org/) is a great open-source graph control for WPF (and other .NET paltforms).
